Technical Nodes

Web Services
------------

classification/tree/:fromRoot?/:count?

	return list of categories


components/list/:class?/:count?/:cursor?


components/overview/:id


components/search/:fromRoot?/:search/:count?/:cursor?

	Returns a list of components starting from fromRoot that match the search criteria


components/get/:type/:idd



Component Hierarchy
-------------------

componentBrowser
	componentSearch
	componentCategories
		treeNavigator (isis)
	componentListing
		Paging
		countDisplay
		viewSelection
		listView
			itemList (isis)
			downloadButton
			infoButton
		gridView
			uiGrid (Angular)
			downloadButton
			infoButton
